verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
No matter what it looks like
I just want You, want You
In every space of my life
I invite You, invite You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Like a fire, like a flood
Come however You want
However You want
With Your power, with Your love
Come however You want
However You want

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You're breaking all the boxes
Tearing down the walls, the walls
You have no limitations
You exceed them all
You exceed them all

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Like a fire, like a flood
Come however You want
However You want
With Your power, with Your love
Come however You want
However You want

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Faith fills the atmosphere
We know that You are here
Heaven has come to earth
Rebuild every story
Release miracles
Heaven has come to earth

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Like a fire, like a flood
Come however You want
However You want
With Your healing, with Your love
Come however You want
However You want

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Like a fire, like a flood
Come however You want
However You want
With Your healing, with Your love
Come however You want
However You want
